hey: i'm doing an rsync between two drives using a ubuntu livecd. Speed varies between 100 meg/second and 5meg/second every few minutes
your drives cant handle 100meg/sec most likely ... so while its flushing the data to the disks, the transferspeed will drop drastically
even with reading, standard drivers dont do 100meg/sec
in short, tis normal and i should just let it run its course?
does a livecd stop/spin down if i don't use it? (ie. will the transfer slow down when it goes into screensaver mode)
a drive wont be spun down when its active obviously
